mapper.delete: DELETE a,b FROM answer_user a LEFT JOIN question_answer b ON a.answer_id = b.answer_id WHERE a.answer_id = #{answerId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.content,a.picture, a.views, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.is_delete, c.user_id FROM answer a LEFT JOIN question_answer b ON a.id = b.answer_id LEFT JOIN answer_user c ON c.answer_id = a.id WHERE b.question_id = #{id} order by a.create_time desc
